rules:
    parameters-camelCase-alphanumeric-oas3:
        description: Path parameters MUST follow camelCase
        given: $..parameters[?(@.in == 'path')].name
        message: {{property}} path parameter is not camelCase {{error}}
        recommended: true
        severity: warn
        then:
            function: pattern
            functionOptions:
                match: ^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]+$
        x-tags:
            :
